mapper.select: /** * Query ID : selectDatabaseList * Description : DB 조회 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT D.DB_ID , D.DB_NM , D.DB_EXP , S.DB_SVR_ID , S.DB_SVR_NM , S.DFT_DB_NM , S.SVR_SPR_USR_ID , S.SVR_SPR_SCM_PWD FROM T_DB_I D, T_DBSVR_I S, T_USRDBAUT_I A WHERE D.DB_SVR_ID=S.DB_SVR_ID AND D.DB_ID = A.DB_ID AND S.DB_SVR_ID=#{db_svr_id} AND A.usr_id=#{usr_id} AND D.USEYN = 'Y' AND A.AUT_YN = 'Y'
/** * Query ID : selectCodeMethod * Description : 공통코드 method 조회 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT SYS_CD_NM AS CTF_MTH_NM FROM T_SYSDTL_C where GRP_CD = #{grp_cd}
/** * Query ID : selectCodeType * Description : 공통코드 type 조회 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT SYS_CD_NM AS CTF_TP_NM FROM T_SYSDTL_C where GRP_CD = #{grp_cd}
mapper.delete: /** * Query ID : deleteDbAccessControl * Description : DB 접근제어 전체 삭제 * Author : 김주영 **/ DELETE FROM T_SVRACSCNTR_I WHERE DB_SVR_ID=#{db_svr_id}
mapper.select: /** * Query ID : selectLstmdfdtm * Description : 접근제어 이력 수정 일시 조회 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT TO_CHAR(LST_MDF_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')AS LST_MDF_DTM , SVR_ACS_CNTR_HIS_ID FROM T_SVRACSCNTR_HIS_I WHERE DB_SVR_ID=#{db_svr_id} AND PRMS_SEQ = 0 ORDER BY LST_MDF_DTM DESC
/** * Query ID : selectCurrenthisrp * Description : 현재 이력_그룹_ID 조회 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT setval('q_svracscntr_his_grp_i_01',nextval('q_svracscntr_his_grp_i_01'))

/** * Query ID : selectAccessControlHistory * Description : 접근제어이력 조회 * Author : 김주영 **/ SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS ROWNUM , SVR_ACS_CNTR_HIS_ID , SVR_ACS_CNTR_ID , DB_SVR_ID , DTB , PRMS_IPADR , PRMS_IPMASKADR , PRMS_USR_ID , PRMS_SEQ , PRMS_SET , CTF_MTH_NM , CTF_TP_NM , OPT_NM , CMD_CNTS , LST_MDF_DTM , HIS_GRP_ID FROM T_SVRACSCNTR_HIS_I WHERE HIS_GRP_ID = ( SELECT HIS_GRP_ID FROM T_SVRACSCNTR_HIS_I WHERE SVR_ACS_CNTR_HIS_ID=#{svr_acs_cntr_his_id} )
